merch.name: Canvas tote bag
merch.description: Lightweight tote bag with inner pockets. Made from 100% recycled canvas. One size only (12"), available in various prints.

merch.name: Coffee tumbler
merch.description: Perfectly sized 16oz coffee tumbler for when you're on the go. Insulated stainless steel with removable lid.

merch.name: Mug
merch.description: Terracotta mug to keep your cup of java piping hot. Handcrafted in Turkey. Available in different sizes and colors.

merch.name: Gift basket
merch.description: The perfect gift for your favorite coffee lover. Includes one bag of our premium roasted beans.

merch.name: Coasters
merch.description: Set of six 10 cm absorbant drink coasters to hold your favorite beverage (like our coffee).

merch.name: Drip coffee jug
merch.description: Pour over coffee maker with a reusable stainless steel coffee filter. Perfect for home, travel or outdoor.

coffee.name: Novo Coffee
coffee.description: Sweet & Tart .Sugary sweetness that reminds us of malt syrup combines bright lemon-lime acidity and juicy green apple notes.

coffee.name: Saints Coffee Roasters
coffee.description: Balanced & Fruity. Fruity and sweet, with a juicy note of cherry bolstered by a deep, nutty sweetness.

coffee.name: Drink Coffee Do Stuff
coffee.description: Comforting & Rich Silky. This coffee/'s chocolaty-vanilla structure and kiss of roast make it something to howl about

coffee.name: Atomic Coffee Roasters
coffee.description: Comforting & Rich. Nutty and cherry notes complement deep cedar tones make a deliciously light cup brewed hot or cold.

coffee.name: Steady State Coffee
coffee.description: Subtle & Delicate. A rich and buttery pastry crust sort of sweetness in addition to notes of orange marmalade and fresh flowers.

coffee.name: Portrait Coffee
coffee.description: Balanced & Fruity. Chocolaty sweetness shines up front but yields to a soft yet complexly fruity acidity as it cools.

coffee.name: Methodical Coffee
coffee.description: Comforting & Rich. A smooth, rich body and deep chocolaty sweetness envelop notes of roasted walnut and hints of clove.

coffee.name: Feast
coffee.description: Balanced & Fruity. Sweet balance found in soft citrus acidity and toffee sweetness. So smooth and poetic, we had to write a haiku.

coffee.name: Sterling Coffee roasters
coffee.description: Roasty & Smoky. Dark chocolaty sweetness and kiss of roastiness pair beautifully with your milk of choice makes it just as delicious black.

coffee.name: Panther Coffee
coffee.description: Sweet & Inviting. Rich cocoa notes and a creamy body are complemented by hints of plum and a lingering brown sugar sweetness.

coffee.name: Common Voice Trade
coffee.description: Sweet & Smooth. Chocolate and almond butter sweetness for days - this cup offers that classic candy bar profile, with a hint of tangerine acidity.

coffee.name: Portrait Coffee
coffee.description: Sweet & Smooth. A chocolaty sweetness shines throughout this coffee, with a hints of fruit adding complexity and a big, sticky body bringing it all together.

coffee.name: Funky Chicken Red Rooster Coffee
coffee.description: Sweet & Smooth. Don't be surprised if you flap your arms and your feet start kickin' - this balanced blend brings together an earthy sweetness with a bright plum acidity.
